### Paid Claims to Date
This table shows the amount of Paid and Outstanding Losses for Fiji, Vanuatu and Tonga by Treaty Year of Account ("YOA").  The figures are denominated in original currencies, as declared in the various Bordereaux at 31 December 2017.  The Losses are allocated to the relevant Treaty Year of Account by Policy Inception  Date.

```{r,echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE,error=FALSE, message=FALSE}
Claims_Incurred_Report_31_12_17_AAHE_ <- read_excel("D:/Users/user/Dropbox/AIH Underwriting/Hannover Re/Capital General/Accounts/Reports @ 311217/Claims_Incurred_Report_@_31.12.17_(AAHE).xlsx", 
           col_types = c("text", "text", "text", 
           "date", "numeric", "date", "date", 
           "numeric", "text", "numeric", "text", 
           "text"))
ROE <- c(1.60838, 1, 0.42263, 1.48447, 0.03053)
CURR <- c("FJD", "PGK", "SBD", "TON", "VTU")
ROE <- data.frame(CURR, ROE)
PREMIUM <- c(6659833, 4068693, 8651922)
inc <- as.tibble(Claims_Incurred_Report_31_12_17_AAHE_) %>% 
  filter(Contract != "Machinery Breakdown") %>%
  mutate(YOA = ifelse(Inception >= "2016-10-01" & Inception < "2017-10-01", "2017", 
                ifelse(Inception >= "2014-12-13" & Inception < "2016-01-01", "2015",
                ifelse(Inception >= "2016-01-01" & Inception < "2016-10-01", "2016",                  "NA")))) %>%
  merge(ROE, by = "CURR") %>%
  filter(CURR=="FJD" | CURR=="VTU" | CURR=="TON") %>%
  group_by(YOA, CURR, Status) %>%
  summarise(total = round(sum(HRE))) 

inc %>%
  kable("html", escape = F)%>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped","hover","condensed"), font_size = 14, full_width = F, position = "left") 

```

### Aggregate Paid Losses
This table shows the Aggregate Paid Losses across all three Treaty Years of Account for Fiji, Vanuatu and Tonga in original currencies, as declared in the various Bordereaux at 31 December 2017.

```{r,echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
inc %>%
  ungroup %>%
  group_by(CURR) %>%
  filter(Status=="PAID") %>%
  summarise(PAID = sum(total)) %>%
  kable("html", escape = F)%>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped","hover","condensed"), font_size = 14, full_width = F, position = "left")

```
